column2: UPDATE 2-Wal-Mart cuts delivery time for pilot shipping plan CHICAGO
column3: May 12 Wal-Mart Stores said Thursday it was shortening the delivery time for an unlimited shipping program it is testing to two days from three as it taps a network of recently built warehouses for packaging online orders.

column2: Hoplite Capital's Lykouretzos says shorting American Airlines shares LAS VEGAS
column3: May 12 John Lykouretzos
column4: who runs New York-based hedge fund firm Hoplite Capital Management
column5: said on Thursday that the firm is shorting American Airlines Group Inc  as it is the "most compelling short in the U.S. airline industry."

column2: Regeneron CEO says drug price critique by independent group unscientific NEW YORK
column3: May 12 Regeneron Pharmaceuticals  Chief Executive Leonard Schleifer on Thursday took aim at an influential drug pricing watchdog
column4: saying a critique of the company's new cholesterol lowering therapy was non-scientific.

Fitch: Basel Proposals Could Impact US Bank Credit Card Lines (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK/CHICAGO
column3: May 12 (Fitch) The Basel Committee's (BCBS) proposal to apply  higher capital charges for "unconditionally cancellable lines of credit" (UCCs)  could impact internationally active US credit card banks CET1 ratios on average  by 375 basis points
column4: absent any remedial measures from affected institutions
column5: says Fitch Ratings. If implemented by the US authorities
column6: the measures will  encourage US banks to reduce unused lines

column2: UPDATE 2-Wal-Mart cuts delivery time for pilot shipping plan CHICAGO
column3: May 12 Wal-Mart Stores said Thursday it was shortening the delivery time for an unlimited shipping program it is testing to two days from three as it taps a network of recently built warehouses for packaging online orders.

column2: UPDATE 1-U.S. House blocks Google-hosted apps
column3: Yahoo Mail over security fears WASHINGTON
column4: May 11 The U.S. House of Representatives' information technology team has blocked lawmakers from accessing software applications hosted on a Google cloud service to prevent possible hacking campaigns
column5: two congressional sources said on Wednesday.

column3: May 12 Hedge fund managers on Thursday named some of their recent investments
